text: Jan Nolten (20 January 1930 – 13 July 2014) was a Dutch professional road bicycle racer. Nolten rode in five Tours de France, and won two stages. ==Death== Nolten was hospitalized in July 2014 after suffering a brain hemorrhageHersenbloeding treft oud-wielrenner Jan Nolten - De Gelderlander and died three days later.Oud-wielrenner Jan Nolten overleden - Telegraaf == Palmarès == * 1952 ** Tour de France: *** Winner stage 12 * 1953 ** Tour de France: *** Winner stage 8 * 1956 ** Giro d'Italia: *** Winner stage 12 ==References== == Other websites == *Official Tour de France results for Jan Nolten Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:Dutch cyclists Category:People from Sittard-Geleen Category:Sportspeople from Limburg (Netherlands)
title: Jan Nolten
